translation.en: Onefour are Australia's first drill rappers.
translation.es: ONEFOUR son los primeros raperos de drill de Australia.

translation.en: The genre is defined in part by lyrics laden with graphic descriptions
translation.es: El género se define por letras llenas de descripciones de violencia,

translation.en: of violence, including gang warfare.
translation.es: El género se define por letras llenas de descripciones de violencia, incluyendo batallas de pandillas.

translation.en: They say that, uh, children as young as 13 are joining these so- called gangs
translation.es: Dicen que niños de 13 años se unen a estas pandillas

translation.en: that are modeling themselves on violent US rap culture.
translation.es: inspiradas en la violenta cultura del rap estadounidense.

translation.en: We're saying that the music that they're promoting
translation.es: Decimos que la música que promueven

translation.en: is inciting violence.
translation.es: incita a la violencia.

translation.en: The public would expect us to shut that down.
translation.es: El público quiere que la detengamos.

translation.en: Stay out of sight, out of mind, while we get the cops on that side of the building, just so…
translation.es: Manténgase ocultos mientras llevamos a la policía a ese lado.

translation.en: We've gotta stay here, stay out of sight, just in case they jeopardize the show.
translation.es: Tenemos que quedarnos aquí por si ponen en peligro el concierto.

translation.en: I don't know how comfortable I'd feel having a child of mine
translation.es: No sé si me sentiría cómodo si uno de mis hijos fuera a un concierto

translation.en: going to one of these concerts 'cause I'm scared there'll be conflict.
translation.es: No sé si me sentiría cómodo si uno de mis hijos fuera a un concierto porque puede haber conflictos.

translation.en: The Onefour boys, they are amazing songwriters.
translation.es: Los chicos de ONEFOUR son compositores increíbles.

translation.en: You hear it, and, um, and you believe it, you know.
translation.es: Los escuchas y les crees.

translation.en: They've made the biggest cultural impact on the scene in Australia and haven't been able to perform here.
translation.es: Tuvieron un gran impacto cultural y no pudieron tocar aquí.

translation.en: Onefour have become the biggest hip- hop group in this country,
translation.es: ONEFOUR es el grupo de hip-hop más grande del país,

translation.en: but the police won't let them perform to their fans.
translation.es: pero la policía no los deja tocar en vivo.

translation.en: Every single gig they do just gets shut down.
translation.es: Cancelan todos sus conciertos.

translation.en: This story is crazy. They're like the N.W.A. from this country.
translation.es: Es es una locura. Son como los N.W.A. de este país.

translation.en: Pretty much, yeah.
translation.es: Algo así, sí.

translation.en: The way police handled that situation was fucking ridiculous.
translation.es: La policía manejó la situación de manera ridícula.

translation.en: We pray, Father, this time that the show will not be disrupted by any means whatsoever.
translation.es: Oramos, Padre, para que esta vez no interrumpan el espectáculo.

translation.en: I feel like we've come so far, but if we can't do the show, it's over.
translation.es: Siento que llegamos muy lejos. Pero, si no podemos tocar, se acabó.

translation.en: We have intelligence that there is a likelihood of conflict.
translation.es: Tenemos indicios de que puede haber un conflicto.

translation.en: There's no way there'll be a performance here in New South Wales, and I'll do everything I can to stop it.
translation.es: No pueden tocar en Nueva Gales del Sur. Haré lo que pueda para detenerlos.

translation.en: I never thought of music as something that, you know, I would end up taking as a career.
translation.es: Nunca pensé que terminaría teniendo una carrera en la música.

translation.en: We didn't see it as people like us can do music.
translation.es: No creíamos que la gente como nosotros pudiera hacer música.

translation.en: It wasn't an option.
translation.es: No era una opción.

translation.en: We grew up in Mount Druitt. It's a suburb on the outskirts of Western Sydney.
translation.es: Crecimos en Mount Druitt, un suburbio en las afueras de Sídney Occidental.

translation.en: There's a really big Islander community out there.
translation.es: Hay una gran comunidad isleña allí.

translation.en: And we're Samoan.
translation.es: Somos samoanos.

translation.en: I've known most of the boys all my life. I grew up with them.
translation.es: Conozco a la mayoría de los chicos de toda mi vida. Crecimos juntos.

translation.en: We were just normal kids, always playing with other the kids in the street.
translation.es: Éramos niños normales, siempre jugando.

translation.en: Just leave it there.
translation.es: Déjalo ahí.

translation.en: We come from the church. Don't know how the fuck we ended up like this.
translation.es: Íbamos a la iglesia. No sé cómo diablos terminamos así.

translation.en: We didn't really know it at the time, but Mount Druitt back then was, like…
translation.es: En ese entonces no lo sabíamos, pero Mount Druitt era como…

translation.en: …it was hectic.
translation.es: Era un caos.

translation.en: It has that stigma around it, a place that no one really cares about.
translation.es: Tiene su estigma, es un lugar al que nadie le importa.

translation.en: Growing up in Mount Druitt, there was only, like, three options for Islanders.
translation.es: Para los isleños de Mount Druitt, había tres opciones:

translation.en: Either footie, the factory, or a life of crime.
translation.es: el fútbol, la fábrica o una vida delictiva.

translation.en: In high school,
translation.es: En la secundaria,

translation.en: they had this Islander class where they'd try to give advice.
translation.es: había una clase en la que trataban de dar consejos.

translation.en: He was telling us, Youse are all going to jail.
translation.es: Nos decían: Van a ir a prisión.

translation.en: Like, every single one of youse.
translation.es: Cada uno de ustedes.

translation.en: I remember, like, the first time I ever watched the news,
translation.es: La primera vez que vi las noticias, a uno de los chicos de la iglesia

translation.en: it was one of the lads from church just got his head caved in
translation.es: La primera vez que vi las noticias, a uno de los chicos de la iglesia le había roto la cabeza otro grupo de chicos de la zona.

translation.en: from another group of boys, yeah.
translation.es: le había roto la cabeza otro grupo de chicos de la zona.

translation.en: After that, any time I watched the news, it was always about Mount Druitt,
translation.es: Después de eso, siempre se hablaba de Mount Druitt.

translation.en: and if they ever spoke about Mount Druitt, it was just negative.
translation.es: Si hablaban de Mount Druitt, era negativo.

translation.en: Mount Druitt. It's also Sydney, just not the one in the tourist brochures.
translation.es: Mount Druitt. También es Sídney, pero no la de los folletos turísticos.

translation.en: You don't wanna go to Mount Druitt after dark.  No, you… you really don't.
translation.es: No quieres ir a Mount Druitt de noche. No, realmente no.

translation.en: Community groups are pleading for help, with young people scared to go outside.
translation.es: Grupos de la comunidad piden ayuda, y los jóvenes tienen miedo de salir.

translation.en: For us to feel safe, it was just to build this bond
translation.es: Sentirse seguro era… No podíamos andar en la calle.

translation.en: where we can, like, go around the streets and that,
translation.es: No podíamos andar en la calle.

translation.en: and it was like, You got my back, I got your back.
translation.es: Nos cuidábamos el uno al otro.

translation.en: The whole reason the boys started chilling together was…
translation.es: La razón por la que comenzamos a juntarnos

translation.en: was one of our mates ended up getting jumped, like, real bad.
translation.es: fue que uno de nuestros compañeros terminó siendo asaltado.

translation.en: And then the boys come back,
translation.es: Los muchachos regresaron.

translation.en: and they were just like, What are we gonna do? You know? Like, We can't just sit here.
translation.es: Dijimos: ¿Qué vamos a hacer? No podemos quedarnos sentados.

translation.en: And so after that, we started walking around deep.
translation.es: Después de eso, empezamos a juntarnos en grupo.

translation.en: If someone was to cross us, boom, jump straight into it.
translation.es: Si alguien se cruzara con nosotros, lo atacábamos.

translation.en: Everyone had their Rambos ready and their blades and shit.
translation.es: Todos tenían navajas y cuchillas y esas cosas.

translation.en: But we've always seen it as a family from the jump,
translation.es: Siempre nos consideramos una familia.

translation.en: so when they labeled us a gang, we… we already knew how they were trying to portray us.
translation.es: Cuando nos llamaban 'pandilla', sabíamos cómo trataban de retratarnos.

translation.en: We've always had run- ins with police. They just look at us as, like, criminals.
translation.es: Siempre tuvimos roces con la policía. Nos ven como criminales.

translation.en: They used to bash us. That's what they used to do.
translation.es: Solían golpearnos. Eso hacían.

translation.en: I got a gun, mate.
translation.es: Estoy armado.

translation.en: Stay back.
translation.es: Atrás.

translation.en: I got a gun.
translation.es: Estoy armado.

translation.en: This was a time in our lives where we were always getting into trouble,
translation.es: En ese momento, siempre nos metíamos en problemas.

translation.en: going off the rails a bit.
translation.es: Perdimos el control.

translation.en: But then we, um… discovered Street Uni.
translation.es: Pero luego descubrimos Street Uni.

translation.en: We didn't realize at that time how important it would be.
translation.es: No sabíamos lo importante que sería.

translation.en: Esky was the youth leader just taking care of us headaches.
translation.es: Esky era el líder juvenil que nos cuidaba.

translation.en: Street University is a youth center.
translation.es: Street University es un centro juvenil.

translation.en: It's the place where they can belong and feel safe
translation.es: Es el lugar donde pueden pertenecer y sentirse seguros

translation.en: outside of the streets that surround us in Mount Druitt.
translation.es: fuera de las calles de Mount Druitt.

translation.en: We provide resources and programs
translation.es: Brindamos recursos y programas

translation.en: that young people wouldn't usually get involved with,
translation.es: en los que los jóvenes no suelen participar.

translation.en: and one of the ways that we engaged them
translation.es: Una de las formas de atraerlos

translation.en: was through the recording studio.
translation.es: era el estudio de grabación.

translation.en: When they introduced us to the little studio they had, we were stuck on it.
translation.es: Cuando nos presentaron el estudio, nos atraparon.

translation.en: It was, like, a free recording studio, so it was perfect for us,
translation.es: Un estudio de grabación gratuito. Era perfecto.

translation.en: 'cause at the time, we didn't have any money.
translation.es: En ese momento, no teníamos dinero.

translation.en: We got into it straightaway. We loved it.
translation.es: Empezamos de inmediato. Nos encantó.

translation.en: Like, Shit, we could do something like that.
translation.es: Podríamos hacer algo así.

translation.en: I really felt grateful that they had something to channel their energy into
translation.es: Agradecí que pudieran canalizar sus energías

translation.en: other than the mischief they were getting up to.
translation.es: en algo diferente a sus travesuras habituales.

translation.en: So I was like, Man, if you guys are…
translation.es: Dije: Si esto es lo que les gusta

translation.en: if that's your thing, it's gonna keep you out of trouble,
translation.es: Dije: Si esto es lo que les gusta y lo que los mantendrá alejados de las calles,

translation.en: keep you busy so you're not on the streets,
translation.es: y lo que los mantendrá alejados de las calles,

translation.en: I'm good with that.
translation.es: me gusta.

translation.en: J Emz was definitely the leader.
translation.es: J Emz definitivamente era el líder.

translation.en: He would turn to his group and be like, All right, you guys sit there.
translation.es: Se dirigía al grupo y les decía: Siéntense ahí.

translation.en: You sit behind the desk.
translation.es: Tú, atrás del escritorio.

translation.en: I'm just gonna jump on the mic, and we're gonna start.
translation.es: Yo empezaré al micrófono.

translation.en: Spenny…
translation.es: Spenny…

translation.en: I heard of Spenny before I met him.
translation.es: Oí hablar de Spenny antes de conocerlo.

translation.en: He was known as the guy that was in front
translation.es: Era conocido como el que estaba al frente

translation.en: when it came to, like, the brawls.
translation.es: cuando se trataba de peleas.

translation.en: I think Spenny, he was just always that hard case.
translation.es: Creo que Spenny siempre fue difícil.

translation.en: The only way he knew how to solve something was fight.
translation.es: Solo sabía resolver conflictos peleando.

translation.en: YP, that's my younger brother, my blood brother.
translation.es: YP es mi hermano menor, mi hermano de sangre.

translation.en: He was always the youngest in the crew.
translation.es: Siempre fue el más joven.

translation.en: They were like, Yo, yo, Esky, listen to this, and they would show me one of the songs,
translation.es: Me decían: Esky, escucha esto. Y me mostraban una canción.

translation.en: so I'm listening to it, and I'm like, Whose voice is that?
translation.es: Dije: ¿De quién es esa voz?.

translation.en: J Emz is like, That's my brother, YP.
translation.es: J Emz dijo: De mi hermano, YP.

translation.en: And I was like, Wow, bro, a family of musicians.
translation.es: Pensé: Vaya, una familia de músicos.

translation.en: If I was to describe Cell, yeah, it'll be…
translation.es: Si tuviera que describir a Celly, diría…

translation.en: He's a loose cannon, yeah. He's just… You know, he had it rough growing up.
translation.es: Es un caso perdido. Tuvo una infancia complicada.

translation.en: See, Celly, he always had talent in rap. He loved rapping.
translation.es: Celly siempre tuvo talento para el rap. Le encantaba.

translation.en: He wanted to use his rap skills
translation.es: Quería usar sus habilidades para contar

translation.en: to paint a picture of what it's like to grow up in Housing Commission.
translation.es: Quería usar sus habilidades para contar cómo era crecer en las viviendas públicas.

translation.en: So Lekks, he used to work at Street Uni.
translation.es: Lekks trabajaba en Street Uni.

translation.en: Yeah, he was just like that older bro that helped us out in the studio when we started locking in.
translation.es: Fue el hermano mayor que nos ayudó en el estudio cuando empezamos.

translation.en: Lekks was always a rap- head. He… He… He loved his music, you know?
translation.es: Lekks siempre escuchó rap. Le encantaba su música.

translation.en: I remember the first time he showed me Harlem Spartans,
translation.es: Recuerdo la primera vez que me mostró Harlem Spartans,

translation.en: which was the drill group that he was being influenced by.
translation.es: el grupo de drill que lo influenciaba.

translation.en: Lekks goes, This is the future of Australian hip- hop right here.
translation.es: Lekks dijo: Este es el futuro del hip-hop australiano.

translation.en: Ah, drill music. Yeah. Fun for the whole family.
translation.es: Música drill. Diversión para toda la familia.

translation.en: I guess it's a style of rap music. Emerged out of Chicago
translation.es: Es un estilo de música rap. Surgió en Chicago

translation.en: in the early part of the last decade, throughout the 2010s.
translation.es: a principios de la última década.

translation.en: It was kind of like a shock to the hip- hop scene. It was just very abrasive and very raw.
translation.es: Fue un shock para la escena del hip-hop. Es muy abrasivo y muy crudo.

translation.en: A more violent, gritty kind of hip- hop
translation.es: Un hip-hop más violento y descarnado

translation.en: with pretty explicit lyrics referring to what life on the streets was like.
translation.es: con letras explícitas que hacen referencia a la vida en las calles.

translation.en: A lot of references to stabbings, to shootings.
translation.es: Muchas referencias a apuñalamientos y tiroteos.

translation.en: It became part of the international hip- hop mainstream
translation.es: Se convirtió en parte del hip-hop internacional

translation.en: when it crossed over into the UK, particularly into London and South London.
translation.es: cuando cruzó al Reino Unido. Particularmente, a Londres.

translation.en: What Onefour gravitated towards was, like, the UK version of drill.
translation.es: ONEFOUR se inclinó por la versión británica del drill.

translation.en: Drill is dark, and it's scary. It's like a horror movie almost.
translation.es: El drill es oscuro y da miedo. Es como una película de terror.

translation.en: And I think drill really did speak to them when they heard it,
translation.es: Y creo que realmente los tocó cuando lo escucharon.

translation.en: 'cause that's exactly what they were going through.
translation.es: Estaban pasando por eso mismo.

translation.en: We loved it. Like, Shit, we could do something like that.
translation.es: Nos encantó. Podríamos hacer algo así.

translation.en: So when we started experimenting, we started making drill.
translation.es: Así que, cuando empezamos a experimentar, hicimos drill.

translation.en: Every single one say F- T- P Fuck you pigs, release my Gs
translation.es: Todos dicen FTP. Cerdos, suelten a mis hermanos.

translation.en: We're Mount Druitt's real recipe
translation.es: Somos la verdad de Mount Druitt.

translation.en: Before Onefour was even a group,
translation.es: Antes de que ONEFOUR fuera un grupo,

translation.en: they were known in the area as a…
translation.es: se los conocía en la zona como…

translation.en: I hate using the word gang,
translation.es: Odio usar la palabra pandilla.

translation.en: but that's… that's what they were known for.
translation.es: Pero se los conocía así.

translation.en: In the early Onefour tracks, that they were really talking about the violence in the streets.
translation.es: En sus primeras canciones, hablaban de la violencia en las calles.

translation.en: Spenny, one day, he attended my music workshops.
translation.es: Spenny, un día, asistió a mis talleres de música.

translation.en: We were gonna go around in a circle and just share what we wrote.
translation.es: Íbamos a compartir lo que habíamos escrito.

translation.en: And as he was sharing,
translation.es: Y mientras compartía,

translation.en: some of the boys from Onefour walked past the door and was like,
translation.es: pasaron algunos de los chicos de ONEFOUR y dijeron:

translation.en: Spenny, we gotta go. There's something going down.
translation.es: Spenny, tenemos que irnos. Pasó algo.

translation.en: And Spenny looks at me, and he's like, Oh, sorry, man.
translation.es: Spenny me miró y dijo: Lo siento, amigo.

translation.en: I'm like, Nah, it's all good.
translation.es: Y yo: Está bien.

translation.en: And Spenny, like, you know, dropped the notepad, and then he left out the door.
translation.es: Spenny dejó su libreta y se fue.

translation.en: It's like this yin and yang.
translation.es: Es como el yin y el yang.

translation.en: You have the street,
translation.es: Está la calle

translation.en: and then you have the music.
translation.es: y la música.

translation.en: A version of postcode wars happens all over the world,
translation.es: En todo el mundo hay guerras de pandillas.

translation.en: from South Central LA to, you know, Brixton.
translation.es: Desde Los Ángeles hasta Brixton.

translation.en: It's young people who find small communities,
translation.es: Son jóvenes que encuentran una comunidad

translation.en: and they'll defend that at any cost,
translation.es: y la defienden a toda costa,

translation.en: even when it gets tested by an opposing neighborhood.
translation.es: incluso cuando la ataca un grupo opuesto.

translation.en: There's always been drama with, you know, certain areas.
translation.es: Siempre ha habido drama en ciertas áreas.

translation.en: I don't know how it started and all the history behind it.
translation.es: No sé toda la historia detrás de eso.

translation.en: I just guess growing up around it, we got sucked into it.
translation.es: Creo que crecimos alrededor de eso, nos absorbió.

translation.en: Got to a point where you couldn't escape it at all.
translation.es: Llegó un punto en el que no podíamos escapar.

translation.en: When I was involved, uh, in that world,
translation.es: Cuando estaba en ese mundo,

translation.en: I experienced multiple deaths.
translation.es: vi muchas muertes.

translation.en: Um… gang murders, essentially.
translation.es: Asesinatos de pandillas.

translation.en: All young people in their twenties.
translation.es: Jóvenes de 20 años.

translation.en: It turned my life around, and, uh, now I work as a journalist.
translation.es: Cambió mi vida, y ahora trabajo como periodista.

translation.en: Violence becomes the means for you to achieve a status in these areas.
translation.es: La violencia se convierte en el medio para lograr un estatus en estas áreas.

translation.en: Like, the only way you can create an identity for yourself is through violence.
translation.es: La única forma de crear una identidad es a través de la violencia.

translation.en: Well, police have just completed a citywide crackdown on violent crime and weapons possession.
translation.es: La policía tomó medidas en toda la ciudad contra delitos violentos y armas.

translation.en: There has been ongoing conflict between two rival gangs,
translation.es: Ha habido conflictos entre dos pandillas rivales,

translation.en: primarily involving Pacific Islanders.
translation.es: involucrando principalmente a isleños.

translation.en: Rest assured that every single day, there are men and women in this organization
translation.es: Sepan que, cada día, los hombres y mujeres de esta organización

translation.en: who are doing their best to fight those involved in conflict
translation.es: dan su mayor esfuerzo peleando para que nuestras calles sean seguras.

translation.en: for the purpose of making our streets and communities safe.
translation.es: peleando para que nuestras calles sean seguras.

translation.en: In this case, Onefour falls under the banner of Mounty County,
translation.es: En este caso, ONEFOUR está dentro del Condado del Monte.

translation.en: which is the 2770 postcode in Greater Western Sydney,
translation.es: Código postal 2770, en Sídney Occidental.

translation.en: and they were at war with the Inner West Brotherhood or the 21 District.
translation.es: Estaban en guerra con una pandilla del Distrito 21.

translation.en: In drill tracks, a big part of the music is you also diss as well.
translation.es: Una gran parte de las canciones de drill está dedicada a insultos.

translation.en: Check yourself, how you act…  I never wanted to rap until I seen it as a way
translation.es: Nunca quise rapear hasta que lo vi como una forma

translation.en: where I can diss people I didn't like.
translation.es: de insultar a la gente que no me gustaba.

translation.en: When I went in the studio, it was just literally just me, like, passionate and knowing, yeah, I'm gonna offend these guys with this shit
translation.es: En el estudio, sentía pasión y sabía que ofendería a esos tipos

translation.en: because, like, you know, they got one of our friends.
translation.es: porque habían atacado a un amigo.

translation.en: After that, it was like they crossed a line.
translation.es: Fue como cruzar una línea.

translation.en: And it sounds crazy, but that's literally why I loved making my music.
translation.es: Suena loco, pero eso es lo que me gustaba de hacer música.

translation.en: I loved hurting, like, their feelings.
translation.es: Me gustaba herir sus sentimientos.

translation.en: With drill music, that's all you made, was diss tracks.
translation.es: La música de drill estaba llena de insultos.

translation.en: With that kind of platform of making music
translation.es: Con esa plataforma para hacer música

translation.en: and being able to tell your story coupled with social media,
translation.es: y poder contar su historia en las redes sociales.

translation.en: you know, it's like, that's a shitstorm.
translation.es: Es una bomba de tiempo.

translation.en: I was worried that some of the songs were obviously gonna exacerbate the violence in the area.
translation.es: Me preocupaba que algunas de las canciones exacerbaran la violencia en el área.

translation.en: One time, there was this incident at the train station.
translation.es: Una vez hubo un incidente en la estación de tren.

translation.en: Word got around that people from another postcode were coming down,
translation.es: Se corrió la voz de que vendría gente de otro código postal.

translation.en: so there was gonna be a massive brawl.
translation.es: Iba a haber una pelea masiva.

translation.en: At that brawl, a Molotov was thrown in that tunnel.
translation.es: En esa pelea, arrojaron una bomba molotov en el túnel.

translation.en: We… said this needs to stop.
translation.es: Dijimos que eso debía terminar.

translation.en: Big high hopes, right,
translation.es: Era muy ambicioso

translation.en: um, to try and stop something that's been happening for decades.
translation.es: intentar detener algo que sucedía desde hace décadas.

translation.en: There's always gonna be conflict. There's always gonna be drama.
translation.es: Siempre habrá conflicto y drama.

translation.en: We were just doing whatever we wanted, and trouble was like a normal thing.
translation.es: Hacíamos lo que queríamos y los problemas eran algo normal.

translation.en: After that, something ended up happening, and I ended up going to jail.
translation.es: Después de eso, terminé en prisión.

translation.en: We ended up just getting into an altercation with another group of boys,
translation.es: Terminamos discutiendo con otro grupo de chicos,

translation.en: and it just escalated.
translation.es: y todo escaló.

translation.en: It was pretty bad.
translation.es: Fue bastante malo.

translation.en: - - J Emz went to jail. Without him there, maybe four or five months later,
translation.es: J Emz fue a prisión. Sin él, unos cuatro o cinco meses después,

translation.en: YP started to fall into trouble as well.
translation.es: YP también empezó a meterse en problemas.

translation.en: That night at the pub…
translation.es: Esa noche en el bar…

translation.en: That… that night was a killer night for us.
translation.es: Esa noche fue terrible para nosotros.

translation.en: I don't blame any of the other boys. I don't put it on them. He…

translation.en: but if you really want music to be your way of getting out of that,
translation.es: pero si quieren que la música sea su forma de salir de eso,

translation.es: Sin él, para ser honesto, no habría ONEFOUR.

translation.en: I direct, uh, a label which is a joint venture with Sony.

translation.es: ya sea de las islas del Pacífico o del hip-hop.

translation.es: No quería aparentar. Solo quería entrar y rapear.

translation.es: El hip-hop siempre ha sido un vehículo para las minorías y los oprimidos.

translation.es: El drill no intenta ser una música técnica.

translation.es: Se trata de contar la historia de la manera más auténtica posible.

translation.en: you're gonna get angry.
translation.es: te vas a enojar.

translation.en: It was like the camp of the group was split in two.
translation.es: Era como si el grupo estuviera dividido en dos.

translation.en: There was a group of them saying,
translation.es: Había un grupo de ellos que decía:

translation.en: Yes, Onefour are promoting gang violence,
translation.es: ONEFOUR está promoviendo la violencia de las pandillas.

translation.en: and then there was the other half going,
translation.es: Y la otra mitad decía:

translation.en: They are, but that is not the full picture.
translation.es: Es cierto, pero eso no es todo.

translation.en: There was a lot of shock. There were tears.
translation.es: Hubo mucha conmoción. Hubo lágrimas.

translation.en: I recall some people, halfway through the presentation,
translation.es: Recuerdo que algunas personas, a mitad de la presentación,

translation.en: just getting up and leaving, and saying, These are our family members.
translation.es: se levantaron y se fueron, diciendo que esa era nuestra familia.

translation.en: It was oriented to be intimidating,
translation.es: Estaba orientado a intimidar

translation.en: to scrutinize our communities
translation.es: y a examinar a nuestras comunidades,

translation.en: who feel already out of place.
translation.es: que ya se sienten fuera de lugar.

translation.en: It's so stupid,
translation.es: Es estúpido

translation.en: in my opinion, spending money on stupid shit like that
translation.es: gastar dinero en estupideces como esa

translation.en: when they could be, like, helping the kids and shit on the streets.
translation.es: cuando podrían ayudar a los niños en las calles.

translation.en: It's a shame 'cause there's so much resources behind you.
translation.es: Es una pena, tienen muchos recursos.

translation.en: You can do so much to be able to touch people
translation.es: Pueden hacer mucho para llegar a la gente

translation.en: and… and build that bridge between youth and police.
translation.es: y construir lazos entre los jóvenes y la policía.

translation.en: Then one of my officers came to me said, Boss, they're starting to do concerts.
translation.es: Un oficial vino y me dijo: Están empezando a hacer conciertos.

translation.en: In fact, they've got one, and I think it was a theater in Sydney.
translation.es: Creo que fue en un teatro en Sídney.

translation.en: And they said, We're concerned that if this concert goes ahead,
translation.es: Dije: Nos preocupa que si este concierto se lleva a cabo,

translation.en: it's really gonna be a clash of, you know, the Onefours will turn up, but also 21 District,
translation.es: habrá un conflicto. Estará ONEFOUR, pero también Distrito 21.

translation.en: and if they do, they're not gonna sit there and share Jaffas together.
translation.es: Si lo hacen, no será para compartir el pan.

translation.en: Well, we knew that the police
translation.es: Sabíamos que la policía

translation.en: were gonna try to do whatever they could to disrupt.
translation.es: intentaría hacer todo lo posible para perturbarnos.

translation.en: But we… we had no idea, like, to what lengths they would go to.
translation.es: Pero no sabíamos hasta dónde llegarían.

translation.en: 'Cause they were so full of great ideas, these… these police.
translation.es: Nuestros policías estaban llenos de grandes ideas.

translation.en: And they said, We're gonna go and talk to the promoters and just tell them about the concerns we have.
translation.es: Dijeron que hablarían con los promotores y les contarían nuestras preocupaciones.

translation.en: I provide all the information to the venues, and I say to 'em,
translation.es: Les di toda la información a los teatros y les dije:

translation.en: You can't provide the safety that needs to be provided
translation.es: No pueden proporcionar la seguridad necesaria para el evento.

translation.en: for this event to go ahead, and the cost of the tickets
translation.es: No pueden proporcionar la seguridad necesaria para el evento. El costo de las entradas no puede pagar

translation.en: are never gonna cover the amount of police they need
translation.es: El costo de las entradas no puede pagar los policías necesarios para un evento como este.

translation.en: to try and safely run an event like this.
translation.es: los policías necesarios para un evento como este.

translation.en: I will do that for every event in New South Wales until the violence stops.
translation.es: Haré lo mismo para cada evento hasta que cese la violencia.

translation.en: It's ridiculous.
translation.es: Es ridículo.

translation.en: Yeah, it just got to the point where the promoters just had enough.
translation.es: Sí, llegó el punto en que los promotores se rindieron.

translation.en: This is the first time ever that one of our shows got shut down.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que cancelan uno de nuestros conciertos.

translation.en: If you find an opportunity to break out of these hoods
translation.es: Si encuentras la oportunidad de salir de esos barrios

translation.en: and make something of yourself,
translation.es: y tener una buena vida,

translation.en: and then the police tell you you're never gonna perform live
translation.es: y luego la policía te dice que nunca tocarás en vivo

translation.en: in the city that raised you to your biggest fans,
translation.es: en la ciudad que te crio y para tus admiradores,

translation.en: it's really demoralizing.
translation.es: es muy desmoralizador.

translation.en: We got banned from playing in Sydney,
translation.es: Nos prohibieron tocar en Sídney,

translation.en: but it didn't mean we couldn't play in another state.
translation.es: pero podíamos tocar en otros lados.

translation.en: We booked a show in Brisbane. 2,000 people.
translation.es: Preparamos un concierto en Brisbane para 2000 personas.

translation.en: We announced the show,
translation.es: Anunciamos el espectáculo

translation.en: and within probably ten minutes to 15 minutes, it was sold out.
translation.es: y, en unos 10 o 15 minutos, se agotó.

translation.en: This was big for us 'cause it was our first headline show.
translation.es: Fue la primera vez que fuimos el acto principal.

translation.en: I feel like it's a bit of a spotlight, you know? I'm proud.
translation.es: Están en el centro de la atención. Estoy orgulloso.

translation.en: Nah, yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: We worked really tightly with the event promoters,
translation.es: Trabajamos de manera cercana con los promotores,

translation.en: who are also Pacific Islander.
translation.es: que también son isleños.

translation.en: We made sure that there were community elders the kids would recognize
translation.es: Nos aseguramos de que hubiera ancianos de la comunidad que los jóvenes reconocieran en la sala.

translation.en: in the room before they entered,
translation.es: que los jóvenes reconocieran en la sala.

translation.en: and we worked very closely with the local community to make sure that there was no trouble.
translation.es: Y trabajamos con la comunidad para asegurar que no hubiera problemas.

translation.en: Everyone in Australia in the music industry is watching this show.
translation.es: Todos en la industria de la música está viendo el concierto.

translation.en: Number one thing basically is no sign of any violence.
translation.es: Lo principal es que no hay señales de violencia.

translation.en: The adrenaline's hitting now, and we're keen, you know?
translation.es: La adrenalina está subiendo y estamos ansiosos.

translation.en: We're ready to get on stage.
translation.es: Estamos listos.

translation.en: Dear heavenly father, thank you for bringing us all together.
translation.es: Querido Padre, gracias por unirnos a todos.

translation.en: - Amen. - Let's go, boys.
translation.es: - Amén. - Vamos, muchachos.

translation.en: Brisbane show was their moment to shine.
translation.es: El concierto de Brisbane. Era su momento de brillar.

translation.en: That's when I realized the amount of fans we had.
translation.es: Ahí me di cuenta de cuántos seguidores teníamos.

translation.en: It was crazy to see. Just like, fuck yeah!
translation.es: Fue una locura. ¡Maldición, sí!

translation.en: We're actually gonna be able to leave this life behind.
translation.es: Vamos a poder dejar esta vida atrás.

translation.en: Made me realize being on that stage is what I wanna do.
translation.es: Me di cuenta de que era lo que quería hacer,

translation.en: Having shown that we could hold, uh, an event safely,
translation.es: Como demostramos que podíamos hacer un evento seguro

translation.en: we thought, like, There should be no problems now.
translation.es: pensamos que no tendríamos más problemas.

translation.en: We drop In the Beginning, and everyone goes crazy.
translation.es: Tocamos In the Beginning y todos se volvieron locos.

translation.en: Everyone's really positive, like super, super excited,
translation.es: Todos estaban positivos y emocionados.

translation.en: and we decide that, you know, now's the perfect time to do a national tour.
translation.es: Decidimos que era el momento de hacer una gira nacional.

translation.en: Melbourne, Adelaide, Perth, over to NZ, back to Sydney.
translation.es: Melbourne, Adelaida, Perth, Nueva Zelanda y de vuelta a Sídney.

translation.en: Couple of hours after announcing, we're already on the verge of selling out.
translation.es: Un par de horas después de anunciarlo, estaba por agotarse.

translation.en: We're doing the rehearsals and preparing for this national tour.
translation.es: Estábamos ensayando y preparándonos para la gira nacional.

translation.en: And the guys are going through their set, super excited.
translation.es: Los chicos ensayaban, estaban muy emocionados.

translation.en: Everyone's, like, nailing their verses, and the set's coming together.
translation.es: Todos hacían un gran trabajo, iba tomando forma.

translation.en: Fucking love now, baby! Fucking sick!
translation.es: ¡Cuánto amor, querido! ¡Estupendo!

translation.en: - We love you! Oh! -
translation.es: ¡Te amamos!

translation.en: Thanks for real, buddy, yeah? Thank you! This is the best day ever!
translation.es: Gracias a todos. ¡Es el mejor día de mi vida!

translation.en: And I get a message from our booking agent
translation.es: Recibí un mensaje de nuestro agente de reservas

translation.en: saying that Raptor have approached venues
translation.es: diciendo que la policía había contactado a los teatros

translation.en: in Melbourne and Adelaide,
translation.es: de Melbourne y Adelaida.

translation.en: and it looks like one of the venues is about to pull out
translation.es: Uno de los teatros estaba por dar marcha atrás

translation.en: because of pressure from the police.
translation.es: por la presión de la policía.

translation.en: The police are sending intimidating letters to the venues to say,
translation.es: La policía estaba intimidando a los teatros. Decía:

translation.en: If you have this group play, we're gonna have a little closer look
translation.es: Si aceptan a esta banda, veremos más de cerca

translation.en: at some of those breaches of your liquor- licensing laws
translation.es: las infracciones a su licencia para vender alcohol

translation.en: that might've occurred over the last couple of years,
translation.es: que podrían haber ocurrido,

translation.en: and perhaps you won't have that license into the future.
translation.es: y tal vez perderán su licencia.

translation.en: Anyone looking at the letter
translation.es: Cualquiera que viera esa carta

translation.en: would probably interpret it as something being very close to blackmail.
translation.es: probablemente la interpretaría como algo cercano a un chantaje.

translation.en: We didn't say they couldn't perform.
translation.es: No dijimos que no podían actuar.

translation.en: We just had an obligation
translation.es: Teníamos la obligación

translation.en: to tell the venues of the potential risk.
translation.es: de informar a los lugares del riesgo potencial.

translation.en: I wanna really set the record straight, that it wasn't the police that stopped it.
translation.es: Quiero que quede claro que la policía no los detuvo.

translation.en: The venue itself determined that they weren't prepared to allow that, um, concert to go ahead.
translation.es: Los teatros decidieron no seguir adelante con los conciertos.

translation.en: When I read that email, I was like, Oh man, how do I tell these boys this?
translation.es: Cuando me enteré, pensé: ¿Cómo se lo digo a los chicos?

translation.en: It's just gonna destroy their morale.
translation.es: Esto los destruirá.

translation.en: And I'm sitting them down after rehearsals and saying, Look, I've got a bit of news.
translation.es: Los senté después de los ensayos y les dije: Tengo noticias.

translation.en: The police are pressuring Melbourne, and we're gonna lose Melbourne.
translation.es: La policía presiona al teatro de Melbourne. Lo perderemos.

translation.en: And they said, As long as we don't lose Sydney,
translation.es: Y dijeron: Si no perdemos Sídney,

translation.en: as long as we get to do home, like, it's okay.
translation.es: si podemos presentarnos en casa, está bien.

translation.en: And the next day, we rehearsed again,
translation.es: Y al día siguiente, volvimos a ensayar.

translation.en: and I got the second piece of news that we were gonna lose Adelaide and Sydney.
translation.es: Recibí la noticia de que perderíamos Adelaida y Sídney.

translation.en: Yeah, it happened day by day. Like, we lost each venue a day at a time.
translation.es: Sí, pasaba cada día. Cada día perdíamos un lugar.

translation.en: Oh, no venue wanted to do anything with us because of the police pressure.
translation.es: Ningún lugar quería hacer nada con nosotros.

translation.en: Yeah, it was heartbreaking for us.
translation.es: Fue desgarrador.

translation.en: They wanted to fight back, but how do you fight?
translation.es: Querían contraatacar, pero ¿cómo?

translation.en: How do you fight back against something that big?
translation.es: ¿Cómo luchar contra algo tan grande?

translation.en: Touring for an artist is… is a big deal.
translation.es: Para un artista, las giras son importantes.

translation.en: It's… it's… it's their opportunity to not only connect with their fans
translation.es: Es su oportunidad no solo de conectarse con sus seguidores,

translation.en: but it's an opportunity to make some really good money.
translation.es: sino también de ganar mucho dinero.

translation.en: It's interesting because, um, I think we should give these guys a go.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos darles una oportunidad.

translation.en: They've got a chance to go, um, international here,
translation.es: Tienen la oportunidad de hacerse internacionales.

translation.en: and it's a known fact that you make your money from concerts.
translation.es: Y se sabe que se gana dinero con los conciertos.

translation.en: Just stifling like that, you're commercially cutting them dry,
translation.es: Si los sofocan así, los arruinan económicamente.

translation.en: like, they'll… they'll have nothing, which I think's massively disappointing
translation.es: No tendrán nada, lo que creo que sería muy decepcionante

translation.en: for a group of guys from Mount Druitt who've done so well to come this far.
translation.es: para un grupo de Mount Druitt que llegó hasta aquí.

translation.en: The only one that we felt like we're definitely gonna be able to do,
translation.es: El único que creíamos que podríamos hacer,

translation.en: and the police can't really do much to interfere, was New Zealand.
translation.es: El único que creíamos que podríamos hacer, porque la policía no podía interferir, era el de Nueva Zelanda.

translation.en: I was like, At least we get to do New Zealand.
translation.es: Al menos podremos ir a Nueva Zelanda.

translation.en: But unfortunately, YP, Lekks, and Celly are due to be sentenced
translation.es: Desafortunadamente, YP, Lekks y Celly esperaban sentencia

translation.en: for that incident at the pub a few years earlier.
translation.es: por ese incidente en el pub unos años atrás.

translation.en: So the only two members who could travel to New Zealand was J Emz and Spenny.
translation.es: Los únicos dos miembros que pudieron viajar fueron J Emz y Spenny.

translation.en: We were excited to get out of the country because of all the dramas that was going on back home.
translation.es: Estábamos emocionados de salir del país por todo el drama que había en casa.

translation.en: We disembarked, and we went through customs,
translation.es: Desembarcamos, pasamos por la aduana

translation.en: and I knew something was wrong
translation.es: y supe que algo andaba mal

translation.en: because I saw quite a number of police.
translation.es: porque vi a muchos policías.

translation.en: We got to immigration,
translation.es: Llegamos a Migraciones.

translation.en: and as we went through to clear passports,
translation.es: Teníamos que mostrar los pasaportes.

translation.en: Spenny tried to go through first,
translation.es: Spenny trató de pasar primero,

translation.en: and the gate wouldn't open.
translation.es: y la puerta no se abrió.

translation.en: Just a big red X.
translation.es: Solo una gran X roja.

translation.en: Who had their passports taken? Can youse three come with me?
translation.es: ¿A quiénes le quitaron los pasaportes? ¿Pueden venir?

translation.en: The rest of you guys, if you want, you can wait…
translation.es: El resto de ustedes…

translation.en: They said that Raptor from Australia has contacted them,
translation.es: Dijeron que la policía de Australia los había contactado

translation.en: saying that we're coming into the country.
translation.es: para decirles que entraríamos al país.

translation.en: As the commander of Strike Force Raptor and the Gang Squad,
translation.es: Como comandante de Strike Force Raptor,

translation.en: it's quite normal that any information about potential risks
translation.es: es bastante normal compartir información sobre riesgos potenciales

translation.en: to another community or another area is passed on.
translation.es: compartir información sobre riesgos potenciales a otras comunidades.

translation.en: It's the only way we can combat organized crime.
translation.es: Es la única manera de combatir el crimen organizado.

translation.en: We don't tell anyone else how to do their job or what to do.
translation.es: No le decimos a nadie cómo hacer su trabajo o qué hacer.

translation.en: We just simply pass on the information about what we found and what we did.
translation.es: Simplemente transmitimos la información que tenemos y lo que hicimos.

translation.en: They tell us that J Emz won't be let into the country
translation.es: Nos dijeron que no dejarían entrar a J Emz

translation.en: because of his prior criminal record.
translation.es: por sus antecedentes penales.

translation.en: I explained to them. I said, This is what we're here for.
translation.es: Les expliqué: Estamos aquí para esto.

translation.en: J Emz doesn't pose any particular risk to the country.
translation.es: J Emz no representa ningún riesgo.

translation.en: He's not gonna offend while he's here. He's here to work.
translation.es: No delinquirá. Vino a trabajar.

translation.en: But they said, We're not letting him into the country, and that was pretty much it.
translation.es: Dijeron: No lo dejaremos entrar, y eso fue todo.

translation.en: Yeah, I was gutted. You know, traveling that whole way and not being able to do it,
translation.es: Estaba destrozado. Llegar allí y no poder hacerlo…

translation.en: but, yeah, I guess I shoulda seen it coming, you know what I mean?
translation.es: Debería haberlo esperado, ¿entienden?

translation.en: While I was in that holding cell, that's when I got the news
translation.es: Mientras estaba en esa celda, me enteré

translation.en: that, um, Lekks, my little brother, and Celly got locked up.
translation.es: de que habían encerrado a Lekks y a Celly.

translation.en: P got four years.
translation.es: A P, por cuatro años.

translation.en: Lekks got four years, and Celly got… I think he got ten.
translation.es: A Lekks le dieron cuatro años. A Celly, diez.

translation.en: It gets to a certain stage where you just become numb to emotion.
translation.es: Llegas a un punto en el que te vuelves insensible.

translation.en: In the moment, like when, um… when she was calling out the verdict, I knew my family, and that was hard.
translation.es: Cuando dio el veredicto, pensé en mi familia. Fue difícil.

translation.en: But I still had that mind frame, like, Yeah, fuck it. This is the life.
translation.es: Pero todavía tenía el mismo estado de ánimo. Así es la vida.

translation.en: I told my husband, No matter what happens today, I'm not crying.
translation.es: Le dije a mi esposo: Pase lo que pase hoy, no voy a llorar.

translation.en: I'm not gonna put that on him.
translation.es: No le haré ver eso.

translation.en: But I remember just coming home and just going over the Harbour Bridge
translation.es: Pero recuerdo que fuimos a casa y, cruzando el puente,

translation.en: and just wiping my tears.
translation.es: me secaba las lágrimas.

translation.en: When I got the news, yeah, I was pretty broken.
translation.es: Cuando me enteré, estaba destrozado.

translation.en: I thought, like, How are we gonna be able to hold up the crew while they're gone?
translation.es: Pensé, ¿Cómo podremos mantener el grupo mientras no están?.

translation.en: We didn't think they were gonna get that long.
translation.es: No pensamos que sería tanto tiempo.

translation.en: Everything was going so well,
translation.es: Todo iba muy bien.

translation.en: and then, like, for it to just be, like, put on pause,
translation.es: Y luego tuvimos que pausarlo.

translation.en: yeah, it was the worst timing.
translation.es: Fue el peor momento.

translation.en: The show's getting canned, eh? Do you reckon I'd be able to do it by myself?
translation.es: - Cancelarán el concierto. - ¿Crees que podría hacerlo solo?

translation.en: No way.
translation.es: Imposible.

translation.en: You'd suck.
translation.es: Apestarías.

translation.en: That's not happening.
translation.es: No sucederá.

translation.en: - You have to do it by yourself. - Huh?
translation.es: Tienes que hacerlo tú solo.

translation.en: Oh, I felt for Spenny at the time because there's a lot of weight on your shoulders now.
translation.es: Sentí pena por Spenny porque tenía mucha responsabilidad.

translation.en: We didn't know whether we were gonna go through with the show or not.
translation.es: No sabíamos si seguiría con el concierto.

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm doing the show still.
translation.es: A la mierda. Lo haré.

translation.en: Just to let our people know.
translation.es: Díselo a nuestra gente.

translation.en: Run the ball up for the boys, aye.
translation.es: Vamos hasta el final.

translation.en: - The show must fucking go on. -
translation.es: El espectáculo debe continuar.

translation.en: They can't stop… They can't stop us!
translation.es: No pueden detenernos.

translation.en: The show must fucking go on!
translation.es: ¡El espectáculo debe continuar!

translation.en: I wasn't nervous. I was more angry. I wanted to prove a point.
translation.es: No estaba nervioso. Estaba enojado. Quería probar algo.

translation.en: I was over all the bullshit from them, like, just them trying to stop us.
translation.es: Estaba cansado de que intentaran detenernos.

translation.en: I wanted to look back at it and be like, They didn't end up breaking us that night.
translation.es: Quería mirar hacia atrás y decir: Esa noche no nos rompieron.

translation.en: Hope you're ready for tonight. - Ah, tonight! - Whoo!
translation.es: - ¿Están listos para esta noche? - ¡Esta noche!

translation.en: There is a massive show going down
translation.es: Hay un gran espectáculo

translation.en: from a global group who just took the world by storm.
translation.es: de un grupo global que sorprendió al mundo.

translation.en: And I could see Spenny just thinking. Like, he was committed to the idea,
translation.es: Vi que Spenny pensaba. Estaba decidido a hacerlo,

translation.en: but he just didn't know how it was gonna work.
translation.es: pero no sabía cómo iba a funcionar.

translation.en: Unless you go through the shit that we've gone through,
translation.es: A menos que pases por la mierda que pasamos,

translation.en: then come talk to me, bro, you know what I mean?
translation.es: no vengas a hablarme, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: We don't just make fucking music like this because we want to.
translation.es: No hacemos música como esta porque queramos.

translation.en: It's because that's what we've been through.
translation.es: Es por lo que pasamos.

translation.en: And that's why people love it, because a lot of people have been through the same thing, the same situation.
translation.es: Por eso a la gente le encanta. Prque muchos pasaron por lo mismo.

translation.en: That's why people are actually gonna show up.
translation.es: Por eso la gente va a venir.

translation.en: They know it's real, know what I mean? The government doesn't want us to perform.
translation.es: Saben que es real. El gobierno no quiere que lo hagamos.

translation.en: They don't want us to be better, but it's not up to them, you know?
translation.es: No quieren que seamos mejores, pero no depende de ellos.

translation.en: 'Cause the people speak for themselves.
translation.es: Porque la gente habla por sí misma.

translation.en: I was more nervous five minutes before the show.
translation.es: Estaba más nervioso cinco minutos antes del concierto.

translation.en: My legs weren't working, but I just ran with it.
translation.es: No me funcionaban las piernas, pero seguí adelante.

translation.en: It's a lot of weight to carry on your shoulders, you know?
translation.es: Es mucho peso para un par de hombros.

translation.en: But he knew that he had Onefour's reputation to uphold.
translation.es: Pero sabía que debía mantener la reputación de ONEFOUR.

translation.en: He knew that the fans were waiting, like, had been waiting for a long time.
translation.es: Sabía que los fanáticos estaban esperando desde hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Free YP! Free YP!
translation.es: ¡Liberen a YP!

translation.en: They gave Celly ten years and YP four.
translation.es: A Celly le dieron diez años. A YP, cuatro.

translation.en: But, listen, YP wrote this shit just before he got locked up.
translation.es: Escuchen, YP escribió esto justo antes de que lo encerraran.

translation.en: Listen to the fucking lyrics. This shit's a struggle for us.
translation.es: Escuchen la maldita letra. Esta es nuestra lucha.

translation.en: They call us ball runners With the utmost respect
translation.es: Nos dicen perdedores, con el mayor respeto.

translation.en: Well known in the system There's not much of us left
translation.es: Se sabe que en el sistema no quedamos muchos.

translation.en: One of my proudest moments. That show tells you a lot about the character of the group,

translation.en: A global superstar.
translation.es: Una superestrella mundial.

translation.en: Laroi had requested that Onefour support him on his national tour.
translation.es: Laroi había pedido que ONEFOUR lo apoyara en su gira.

translation.en: Well, The Kid Laroi is one of the biggest pop stars on the planet
translation.es: The Kid Laroi es una de las estrellas pop más grandes del mundo,

translation.en: after absolutely exploding onto the scene only a couple of years ago.
translation.es: luego de explotar completamente  hace solo un par de años.

translation.en: Laroi is finally back in Australia for a huge arena tour of the country.
translation.es: Laroi finalmente regresó a Australia para una gran gira por el país.

translation.en: I was trying to have them open for the, uh, for the tour,
translation.es: Quería que abrieran los conciertos de mi gira.

translation.en: and, uh, they… they told me,
translation.es: Quería que abrieran los conciertos de mi gira. Me dijeron:

translation.en: um, There's no way in hell that that's happening.
translation.es: No hay forma de que eso suceda.

translation.en: We're going back and forth, and he was saying
translation.es: Nos comunicábamos y nos decía

translation.en: they won't be able to do the tour if they announce us.
translation.es: que no podrían hacer la gira con nosotros.

translation.en: I said, Oh. Okay, you know what? It's all good. Don't worry about it, and, um, yeah,
translation.es: Dije: Está bien, no se preocupen.

translation.en: so I'm just pretty much gonna just bring them in and just not tell anyone, so…
translation.es: Así que los incluiré sin decirle nada a nadie.

translation.en: That's why I'm sneaking 'em into the show on Thursday.
translation.es: Los voy a incluir en el concierto del jueves.

translation.en: It's gonna be bonkers.
translation.es: Será una locura,

translation.en: They've, you know… They've barely performed two live shows,
translation.es: Apenas realizaron dos conciertos en vivo,

translation.en: you know, so to go out on stage and get their roses
translation.es: así que subir al escenario y recibir aplausos

translation.en: in front of 20,000 Sydneysiders, like, it's not a small thing.
translation.es: frente a 20 000 espectadores no es poca cosa.

translation.en: Tell me Where did they all get their confidence?
translation.es: no es poca cosa.

translation.en: The opportunity to go and perform
translation.es: Finalmente, la oportunidad de tocar

translation.en: actually without fucking getting pressed by any venues,
translation.es: sin que los teatros nos presionen.

translation.en: and big shout out to Kid Laroi
translation.es: Un gran agradecimiento a Kid Laroi.

translation.en: 'cause, you know, we never get to do shows anyway, so fucking love, man, all love.
translation.es: Nunca podemos tocar. Así que amor. Puro amor.

translation.en: Word. They probably think your little apology…
translation.es: Probablemente piensen en tu pequeña disculpa…

translation.en: One- fucking- four, baby!
translation.es: ¡ONEFOUR, bebé!

translation.en: See you… See you later. See youse tonight.
translation.es: Hasta luego. Nos vemos esta noche.

translation.en: It's mad that we get to rehearse, knowing that, on the same night,
translation.es: Es una locura que podamos ensayar sabiendo que en la misma noche

translation.en: we're about to come out in front of 20,000 people.
translation.es: vamos a tocar frente a 20 000 personas.

translation.en: It's gonna be our first time, like, performing with YP on stage for, you know, around three years.
translation.es: Será la primera vez que nos presentemos con YP en tres años.

translation.en: It's crazy, like, doing anything with Kid Laroi at that kinda level, like, it's gonna be big.
translation.es: Es una locura hacer algo con Kid Laroi a ese nivel. Va a ser enorme.
3 HORAS DESPUÉS

translation.en: Police search warrant! Open the door!
translation.es: ¡Redada! ¡Abran!

translation.en: Yeah, just the police, they end up kicking our door in
translation.es: Sí, la policía. Derribaron la puerta

translation.en: and raid us the night of Laroi's first show.
translation.es: y nos allanaron en la noche del primer concierto.

translation.en: It's putrid. You know, like, it's your home, you know,
translation.es: Es horrible. Es tu casa

translation.en: and then you've got a bunch of strangers running in your house, guns out,
translation.es: y hay extraños entrando con armas,

translation.en: this and that, just flippin' it upside down.
translation.es: esto y aquello, dando vuelta todo.

translation.en: You can just imagine what, like, my mum and my sisters would think.
translation.es: Imagínense lo que pensaron mi mamá y mis hermanas.

translation.en: It's just, like,
translation.es: Es…

translation.en: you know, it's wrong.
translation.es: Está mal.

translation.en: The house was searched,
translation.es: Revisaron la casa

translation.en: and they had two police on us the whole time to make sure we didn't leave the room.
translation.es: y dos policías nos vigilaron para que no saliéramos de la habitación.

translation.en: And from then on, we're, like, Fuck's sake.
translation.es: En ese momento, pensamos: Demonios.

translation.en: The boys aren't gonna come. We couldn't make Laroi's first show.
translation.es: Los chicos no van a venir. No pudimos ir al primer concierto.

translation.en: It can't be a coincidence.
translation.es: No puede ser casualidad.

translation.en: There's a motive behind this and a message the police are sending
translation.es: Hay un motivo, un mensaje que la policía envía

translation.en: that, um… that we're not in control, that they are.
translation.es: que dice que no tenemos el control. Ellos lo tienen.

translation.en: Yeah, 100% they knew that we were gonna come out. We were getting ready to leave at six o'clock,
translation.es: Sí, sabían que íbamos a ir. Nos preparábamos para salir a las seis.

translation.en: and their house literally got raided at 5:30.
translation.es: Y allanaron la casa literalmente a las 5:30.

translation.en: If the inference is that Raptor went there because they were doing a surprise visit,
translation.es: Si suponen que la policía fue porque darían un concierto sorpresa,

translation.en: I'm not sure how much of a surprise it must've been.
translation.es: no creo que haya sido una buena sorpresa.

translation.en: But, no, we would never, ever go and do a raid on someone's house because they were gonna sing at a concert.
translation.es: Pero nunca allanaríamos la casa de alguien porque iba a dar un concierto.

translation.en: That's just, in my view, um, nonsense.
translation.es: En mi opinión, eso es una tontería.

translation.en: That's the thing about the cops trying to stop us.
translation.es: Eso es lo que pasa con los policías.

translation.en: If
translation.es: Si

translation.en: they were able to stop us, we'll be worse than what we ever were.
translation.es: logran detenernos, seremos peores que nunca.

translation.en: You know, we're trying to make it out, and putting us back in the trenches,
translation.es: Intentamos salir. Si nos ponen de nuevo en las trincheras,

translation.en: we just create more drama for them.
translation.es: solo crearemos más problemas para ellos.

translation.en: So no matter what we've been through in the past
translation.es: No importa lo que nos haya pasado,

translation.en: and what we've had to go through with Onefour,
translation.es: lo que hayamos tenido superar.

translation.en: I feel like it helps everyone around me, not just myself.
translation.es: Creo que ayuda a todos, no solo a mí.

translation.en: It helps my family. It means everything now.
translation.es: Ayuda a mi familia. Significa todo.

translation.en: Success to them now is, first of all, being able to provide for their friends and family.
translation.es: El éxito para ellos es, en primer lugar, poder mantener a sus amigos y familiares.

translation.en: But that's their culture and where they come from, is like,
translation.es: Esa es su cultura y de dónde vienen.

translation.en: you don't succeed on your own. You gotta bring your village with you.
translation.es: No tienes éxito solo. Traes a tu aldea contigo.

translation.en: I remember when they first came up, J Emz would always say,
translation.es: Cuando aparecieron por primera vez, J Emz siempre decía:

translation.en: When we get big, we're gonna come back and renovate your studio.
translation.es: Cuando seamos grandes, volveremos y renovaremos tu estudio.

translation.en: Lo and behold, just two years later, they came back and renovated the studio.
translation.es: Dos años después, regresaron y renovaron el estudio.

translation.en: There is a lot of young music and young talent coming up.
translation.es: Está surgiendo mucha música joven.

translation.en: I love it. I love hearing at all, you know.
translation.es: Me encanta escucharla.

translation.en: They opened the floodgates for so many other acts,
translation.es: Abrieron las compuertas para que muchos otros artistas,

translation.en: especially from Pacific Islander backgrounds,
translation.es: especialmente los isleños,

translation.en: to get into music and realize that this was a viable career.
translation.es: vieran que la música era una carrera viable.

translation.en: Hell yeah. You know, I'm… I'm very proud of what we achieved.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Estoy muy orgulloso de lo que hicimos.

translation.en: We set out to shift the culture, and we did.
translation.es: Nos propusimos cambiar la cultura y lo hicimos.

translation.en: I think, at the end of the day, it all boils out to, you know, that young boy at home in Mount Druitt
translation.es: Al final de cuentas, todo se reduce a que ese joven en su casa en Mount Druitt

translation.en: suddenly sees these rappers who live across the road from him
translation.es: vea a estos raperos que viven en frente

translation.en: make it to the world stage.
translation.es: llegar al escenario mundial.

translation.en: And suddenly, he gets that spark to dream in the same way.
translation.es: Y, de repente, pueda soñar de la misma manera.

translation.en: One thing I want people to understand is how important it is
translation.es: Quiero que la gente entienda lo importante que es

translation.en: to find something you love and then run with it.
translation.es: encontrar algo que amas y llevarlo adelante.

translation.en: Whether it's music or whether it's anything else.
translation.es: Ya sea música o cualquier otra cosa.

translation.en: That's the one thing that helped us
translation.es: Eso es lo que nos ayudó

translation.en: get out of a lot of the bullshit we had to go through.
translation.es: a salir de la mierda por la que pasamos.

translation.en: Onefour's presence has just had such a massive impact
translation.es: La presencia de ONEFOUR tuvo un impacto masivo

translation.en: on the music industry as a whole in Australia,
translation.es: en la industria de la música del país.

translation.en: but ironically, Onefour have been banned from playing shows,
translation.es: Irónicamente, se les prohibió tocar en vivo.

translation.en: so even though they're the reason why everyone's getting bigger fees,
translation.es: Son la razón por la que todos ganan más dinero,

translation.en: they're not getting their slice of the pie. Essentially a pie that they baked.
translation.es: pero no reciben su parte del pastel que ellos mismos hornearon.

translation.en: As much as we did take that big hit
translation.es: Por mucho que hayamos perdido,

translation.en: losing tours, losing rappers, we're not gonna go out like that.
translation.es: giras y raperos, no nos rendiremos así nomás.

translation.en: No way.
translation.es: De ninguna manera.

translation.en: That's one of the main reasons why we all keep pushing together,
translation.es: Es una de las razones por las que seguiremos juntos.

translation.en: 'cause we know the circle's bigger, the picture's bigger,
translation.es: Sabemos que el círculo es más grande

translation.en: and, you know, there's a lot more to lose if you lose.
translation.es: y hay mucho más que perder si perdemos.

translation.en: So we can't lose.
translation.es: No podemos perder.

translation.en: Luckily for us, Laroi put on another show the next day.
translation.es: Afortunadamente, Laroi hizo otro concierto al día siguiente.

translation.en: Ha ha.
translation.es: Ja.

translation.en: Heading to the show on Friday, you can feel that there's, like, an anxiety or, like, a nervousness,
translation.es: Yendo al concierto del viernes, sentimos ansiedad o nerviosismo,

translation.en: but also, like, a… a suspense.
translation.es: pero también suspenso.

translation.en: We don't know that this is actually gonna happen or not.
translation.es: No sabemos si podremos hacerlo.

translation.en: We can't risk the police catching wind of any of this.
translation.es: No podemos arriesgarnos a que la policía se entere.

translation.en: Stay out of sight, out of mind right now,
translation.es: Manténganse ocultos

translation.en: while we get the cops on that side of the building.
translation.es: mientras llevamos a la policía al otro lado.

translation.en: We just don't want, obviously, them trying to disturb us.
translation.es: No queremos que nos molesten.

translation.en: We gotta stay over here, stay out of sight, in case they jeopardize anything with the show.
translation.es: Tenemos que quedarnos aquí por si ponen en peligro el concierto.

translation.en: Do pray, Father, at this time that the show will not be disrupted by any means whatsoever.
translation.es: Oramos, Padre, para que esta vez no interrumpan el espectáculo.
